LOC :FOCUS

A keyboard accessibility game.

What a nice day to visit the Library!


To get started, use the TAB key on the keyboard to navigate from START to FINISH. More keyboard commands are below the game. Each level will make it harder to ge to the finish!

Level 1 00:00.00

TAB Next

SHIFT + TAB Previous

ENTER Validate

To learn more about accessibility, check out the Digital Accessility Hub.

If you have questions, email accessibility-request@loc.gov.

This game is based on Hocus :focus by @HTeuMeuLeu.
